SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.tojc.ormlite.android.annotation
Annotation Type AdditionalAnnotation.DefaultSortOrder

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public static @interface AdditionalAnnotation.DefaultSortOrder

Be used query method, if you do not specify how to sort. DefaultSortOrder annotation can be used in more than one field. In that case, specify the sort in ascending order of weight. If you omit the order, it will be in ascending order by default. If you specify the SortOrder.Asc, which explicitly grants the ASC.

Author:
Jaken

weight

Default:
0
